name: PSoC4FirmwareUpdateiOS
summary: Bootloader based firmware update library for PSoC4 BLE (4200)
description: Bootloader based firmware update library for PSoC4 BLE (4200), The example app has a bluetooth version of the firmware updater. The sample project used for the updater is at https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/PSoC4OTAUpdate
